locutie.beschrijving: Exegesis of Job's encounter with God in the whirlwind, the meaning of 'dust', and the parallel with Thomas's encounter with the risen Christ.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Deep engagement with Hebrew nuances and biblical-theological themes of revelation.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the nature of God's revelation to Job and Thomas to provide a framework for understanding suffering in New Orleans.
voorbeelden: I have prayed all last week that the Holy Spirit will be the interpreter.
God is the author of creation; the creation is not the author of God.
This is the God proclaimed to us by his Word.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To lead the congregation into a state of 'radical, life-changing humility' and comfort amidst the trauma of Katrina.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Explicitly acknowledged in the introduction and the section on 'seeing' God.

voorbeelden: Job is the man who has lost everything.
The season is bracketed by dust.
God’s answer is no answer at all.
We need to get one problem out of the way.
I wonder if we could all take just a moment.
I have prayed all last week.
I suspect it’s a bit too Baptist for us.
We feel pretty small and embarrassed.
God brought them out of the catastrophe into a new life.
Only the God who is really God can bring forth new life.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Weak. The promises are mostly described in the third person (past tense) rather than directly applied to the hearer in the present.

voorbeelden: This is the God proclaimed to us by his Word.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Low. The preacher describes the act of proclamation rather than performing the act of absolution or blessing directly.

indicatoren: Extensive historical and linguistic footnotes within the text.
Talking about what Job saw rather than making the congregation see.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes a spectator of Job's encounter rather than a participant in their own encounter with God.

performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Intellectual satisfaction but potentially lacking the 'event' of being addressed by God.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Indirect. The promise is mediated through the story of Noah and the theology of baptism.
voorbeelden: Only the God who is really God can bring forth new life where there is only death.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Preacher's preparation and personal reflections on the hymn.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Mostly in the opening illustration and the closing appeal to 'eyes to see'.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Job, God, Thomas, and Paul.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: High. It creates a 'lecture' feel where the biblical characters are the subjects and the congregation is the audience.

verleden_tijd.gebruik: Recounting the narrative of Job and Thomas.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological truths about dust and revelation.

actueel_present.gebruik: Opening prayer and closing hymn reference.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon moves from Assertive (Job's story) to Assertive (Theology of Dust) to Directive (Look at the hymn).
voorbeelden: Job says... Paul says... If we listen to these words...
foutief_patroon.probleem: It lacks the 'Toezegging' (Promise) that bridges the indicative of the text to the life of the hearer.

voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: The message... is grasped only by faith. [Indicative] ... If we listen to these words... [Weak Directive]

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is an excellent theological lecture on the Book of Job, but it remains 'about' God rather than being an 'act' of God.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Analysis of 'I despise myself' vs 'I am comforted that I am dust'.
sterke_punten.effect: Provides a solid intellectual foundation for the sermon's theme.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The sermon describes God's voice to Job but rarely uses the preacher's voice to speak for God to New Orleans.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is a teaching event, but not a sacramental event where the Word 'happens' to the hearer.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher acts as an observer/commentator rather than a mandatory/ambassador.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is described as the speaker in the past (to Job), but not actively speaking through the preacher now.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: The preacher prays for the Spirit to interpret, but then retreats into scholarly reporting.
tekstueel_bewijs: I have prayed... that the Holy Spirit will be the interpreter.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, faith is seen as the Spirit's work.
tekstueel_bewijs: Through the Word of God the Holy Spirit creates such faith.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Theoretically affirmed, but not performatively enacted.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Low. The language is descriptive rather than epiphanic.
tekstueel_bewijs: In this living Word, God makes himself present to us.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 3rd person singular 'is' and 'says' verbs. Needs more 2nd person plural 'you' and 1st person 'I' (as God's herald).

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Job is the man who has lost everything.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: You are the people who have lost everything in this city.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from historical report to direct address.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried in a description of baptismal theology.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Directly proclaim the promise of the Resurrection to the suffering people of New Orleans.
voorbeeldzinnen: To you, in the dust of New Orleans, Christ promises: I am your life.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'you' to confront the hearer with the whirlwind.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The imperative (hymn) is not grounded in a direct declarative of grace.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Declare the presence of God before asking for the response of the soul.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: Theologically rich and exegetically sound, but needs to move from 'talking about' Job to 'proclaiming to' the congregation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT reveals that the preacher's role is not just to send a message (Sender), but to perform a divine act (Mandatary).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The focus is not on the beauty of the Katrina metaphors, but on the illocutionary force of the Word.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT identifies that the 'Constative Surplus' (too much information) is what prevents the sermon from becoming a 'Sacramental Event'.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: I am comforted that I am but dust.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: Strong as a quote, but lacks the force of a direct promise to the hearer.

appendices.notities: The sermon functions more as a 'companion piece' (as noted in the intro) than a standalone performative event.
